product_name: Lonely Planet Guides The Not-For-Parents Travel Book
long_description: In pages of. Authors: Michael Dubois, Katri Hilden and Jane Price. Hardcover, 207 pages, color photographs. Lonely Planet Publications Pty. Ltd.; copyright 2011. . Measures 12.5 x 9.5 in.
short_description: In pages of The Not-For-Parents Travel Book are the epic events, amazing animals, hideous histories, funky foods and crazy facts that make the world's 200 countries so fascinating for kids.
